messages.title: On 7th May 2015 your vote will deliver:
messages.content: 1. The leadership that gives us a strong economy. 2. A referendum on Europe. 3. Funding for our local priorities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The leadership that gives us a strong economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Competitiveness, leadership for growth and jobs, job generation, steering through economic difficulties.
Commitment to holding an in-out referendum on Europe by the end of 2017.
Fighting for a fairer deal on policing, handing power back to local people to shape our communities.

issues.brexitEurope: A commitment for an in-out referendum on Europe by the end of 2017.
issues.economy: Strong leadership for a strong economy, growth and securing jobs.
issues.governance: Localism and giving power back to local people.

housing.content: Holding back the development of Green Belt land;

quotes.text: I will deliver the kind of leadership that gives us a strong economy

images.caption: Leaflet front and inside pages of Peter Lilley campaign

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet shows Peter Lilley has served under two Prime Ministers and has considerable experience.
